#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<cmath>
#include<set>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
int circular_prime[]={2,3,5,7,11,13,17,31,37,71,73,79,97,113,131,197,199,311,337,373,719,733,919,971,991,1193,1931,3119,3779,7793,7937,9311,9377,11939,19391,19937,37199,39119,71993,91193,93719,93911,99371,193939,199933,319993,331999,391939,393919,919393,933199,939193,939391,993319,999331};
set<int>st;
int n=sizeof(circular_prime)/sizeof(circular_prime[0]);
for(int j=0 ;j<n;j++)
st.insert(circular_prime[j]);
int t,k;
cin>>t;
for(int i=0;i<t ;i++)
{cin>>k;
if(st.find(k)!=st.end())
cout<<"1 ";
else
cout<<"0 ";
}
return 0;
}
